text: (Dar iʙtidoi Islom cangidan ʙar muqoʙili kuffor mamnu' ʙud va ʙar azijati onho saʙr kardan ma'mur ʙud. Pas vaqte, ki azijati musrikon to coe rasid, ki Pajomʙar sallallohu alajhi va sallam az Makka ʙa Madina hicrat namud va Islom quvvat pajdo kard.) Ba musalmonon cangidan ʙo kuffor ruxsat doda sud, ʙa saʙaʙi on ki onho mavridi sitam qaror giriftaand va ʙegumon Alloh ʙar jori kardan va piruz gardonidani onho tavonost
